sentence: Maddock, a fan of Republican gubernatorial contender James Craig, was in the room with the retired Detroit police chief when he met Trump to pitch an endorsement.
author: David M. Drucker
title: Top GOP official in Michigan aiding Trump's bid to install loyalists in Lansing
